title: Acronis True Image 2017 20.0 Build 5554 Bootable ISO [SadeemPC]
description:
Acronis True Image 2017 v20.0.5554 BootCD

Acronis True Image 2017 BootCD is a rescue bootable media â€“ a standalone version of Acronis True Image 2016 that you can use to boot a crashed machine or a machine without any operating system and restore an image of your system.

Many of you know Acronis True Image is the #1 backup program. Most of the time I do not use it from the installed program, I use the Boot CD. This requires no installation, tends to have less issues. It is amazingly easy to use.

WhatÃ¢Â€â„¢s New in Acronis True Image 2017:
The Fastest Backup in the Industry
As a global partner of the Scuderia Toro Rosso Formula 1 Racing Team, Acronis is committed to delivering the fastest data protection products in the industry. The new Acronis True Image 2017 is between 3 times to 6 times faster than the nearest competitor when backing up to an external hard drive, and 30% faster when backing up to Apple Time Machine. When backing up to the Acronis Cloud, the new 2017 release is up to 25% faster than last yearÃ¢Â€â„¢s version.

Back up your mobile device content
Mobile phone operating systems take care of applications and settings. Acronis protects photos, videos, contacts, reminders, and calendar appointments. Now, you can back up mobile devices to a local Windows computer in addition to the cloud.

Manage backup plans remotely
Configure backups and review status for any computer or mobile device regardless of location. Great for family or home office data protection.

Incremental Social Backup
DonÃ¢Â€â„¢t let accidental deletion or social network errors erase your memories and photos. Automatically back up
â€“ Back up only changes to your feed, not the whole feed each time, to reduce backup size.
â€“ Works in the background without user intervention.
â€“ Have complete control of your images without needing to rely on native social media tools.

Fast, powerful search
Search for files within local and cloud backups, archives. Make sure you are recovering from the correct backup to save time. Or recover one file â€” the correct one â€” instead of having to recover an entire backup and then search.

Easy to setup notifications
E-mail notifications reduce uncertainty and provide confidence about your backup status â€” even if you walk away from your computer.

Archive
Save space by securely archiving older files to local drives or the cloud. Yet retain easy access to them via icons in Windows Explorer or Mac Finder or via web browser.

Just Two Clicks
It takes just two clicks to perform a full image backup. One click to add a new backup plan, the second click to start it. Of course if you want them, deep technical options and settings are just one more click away
